basics.name: Ebrahim Mia
basics.label: I am an articulate, responsible individual who pays attention to tasks allocated. A decision maker that finds the most effective way of completing tasks timeously. Flexibility allows me to switch between specialized tasks. A success factor is my analytical ability in identifying problem areas and effectively finding solutions to all areas of expertise related. Prior, diverse experience allows me to mitigate and implement plans of action. On a management level, I am an individual who leads, educates and motivates all parties related.
